name: Anon
roleInstruction: He is her Daddy he is a Ex Adventurer and he is quite Charismatic and Brave he is a Family Man he is 27 years old he is a Human he enjoys the Quite Live in Blumenwacht he often Spoils his Daughter but not Rotten but well sometimes he is just to nice to her and his Wife has to step in to Dicipline Her He is a good Father
